title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message:
Hello
Please i need help for the mainboard model 820-01987
I have check and no liquid damage but when i put charger i have 20v and between 0.850A and 1.3A
Fan no Turn, no sound, no picture
Ppbus_g3h 12.6v correct
Cant detect dfu mode

When disconnect battery i have 20v/0.019A

I need help for found problem 
Thanks à lot
Regards
Thomas

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Do you get voltage at L7670/90?

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message:
thanks for your message :)
L7670 : 5v
L7690 : 3.3v

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message:
Any other big coil gets voltage?

Machine should appear in DFU mode.
Be sure to follow all the tutorial steps.
You can check SOC_DFU_STATUS, to make an idea about actual board state.
Try forcing with SE032 pads.

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message:
L7270 : 0v
L7210 : 0V
L7220 : 0V
L7410 : 0V
L7420 : 0V
L7702 : 0V
L8410 : 0V
L8100 : 0V
L7030 : 12.75V
SOC_DFU_STATUS  is down U3900 and U3100 
for dfu i don't detect
when i push the 4 button, the macbook have 20V but 0.000A

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message: ok i have dfu mode but impossible to restore, i have error libusrestore error:21 [com.apple.MobileDevice.MobileRestore -- 0x15 (21)]

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message:
Flash SoC ROM (U4770) and try DFU again.
Make backup first.
Be aware, is 1V8 chip!

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message:
arf don't have reader for this, only for bios
can get on donor mainboard?

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message:
If you plan to stay in business with MacBooks, need to get such programmer.

You can try another chip from donor board, same model.
However, should be good to make a backup of that one too.
In case you need to put it back.

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message:
I have buy programmer, receive tomorrow 
I have lot but not for this
Thanks

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message:
The programmer itself is not the problem.
CH341A can do the job.
The problem is to get good 1V8 adapter and support board to solder the chip (USON 3x4).

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message: i have receive, do you have file? or link? Thanks

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message: Perfect thanks i test tomorrow when im office

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message: flash now and i have same error message

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message:
Error 21 was solved sometimes reflashing SoC ROM.
But may have SSD problem in fact.

Just in case, check diode mode to ground on big coils and SSD power rails.
Also check at Power FETs output, page 74.
Compare readings with good boards.

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message: what is strange is that I have no display, no ventilation and nothing on the touch bar

title: 820-01987 20v - 1A but no start
message:
Why strange, if your board doesn't boot?
You can expect these untill CPU starts to work...
